title: Crunchy banana yoghurt
description: Banana and yoghurt are a perfect low-calorie breakfast combination that will keep you going until lunchtime. The banana adds sweetness without the need for extra sugar and the seeds bring a satisfying crunch. As part of an Intermittent diet plan, 1 serving provides: Your daily piece of fruit 2 of your 3 daily low-fat dairy portions This meal provides 149 kcal per portion.
tips: Look out for mixed bags of pumpkin, sesame and sunflower seeds but watch your portion size carefully as they are very high in calories.

default: 15g/½oz mixed seeds (pumpkin, sesame and sunflower) (or use toasted flaked almonds)

steps: Divide the yoghurt between two small bowls. Scatter the banana on top.
Sprinkle with seeds or nuts and serve.
